subject: All Star Games
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Marian Gaborik of the Rangers scored three goals as Team Chara beat Team Alfredsson, 12-9, in the N.H.L. All-Star Game.
snippet: Marian Gaborik of the Rangers scored three goals as Team Chara beat Team Alfredsson, 12-9, in the N.H.L. All-Star Game.
